title: Paul McCartney says AI was used to create the 'last Beatles record'
description: Paul McCartney shares his thoughts on AI, which he said was used to help create the last Beatles album.

title: Judge allows E. Jean Carroll to amend pending defamation lawsuit against Trump
description: As former President Trump was being arraigned in Florida, he was dealt another blow when a judge allowed writer E. Jean Carroll to amend a defamation lawsuit against him.

title: 'Smartphones' for sharks: Scientists upgrade sensors to keep track of Cape Cod's white sharks
description: White sharks off Cape Cod are getting better sensors, including cameras.

title: Cormac McCarthy, lauded author of 'The Road' and 'No Country for Old Men,' dies at 89
description: Pulitzer Prize-winner's books included "All the Pretty Horses," "Blood Meridien"

title: Olympian dies from pregnancy complication that disproportionately impacts Black women
description: Tori Bowie was around 8 months pregnant at the time of her death, an autopsy found.

title: Reddit communities 'go dark' to protest planned platform changes
description: Much of Reddit is inaccessible as users protest planned changes to the website.

title: As Trump faces charges in docs case, special counsel quietly continuing Jan. 6 probe
description: As former President Trump faces charges related to classified documents, the special counsel's separate probe into efforts to overturn the 2020 election presses on.

title: Frozen fruit from Costco recalled over hepatitis A contamination concerns
description: Wawona Frozen Foods has voluntarily recalled year-old, 4-pound bags of Organic Daybreak Blend with strawberries grown in Mexico that may be contaminated with hepatitis A.

title: Fact-checking claims made by Trump and his Republican allies after his 2nd indictment
description: The response from Trump and his staunchest supporters to his second indictment includes inaccurate claims about the Espionage Act and the Presidential Records Act.

title: Legal experts break down Trump charges where no motive mentioned
description: Missing from the indictment "is a picture of the motive," one expert said.

title: Pyrex, Instant Pot maker seeks bankruptcy protection as sales go cold
description: The maker of Pyrex glassware and Instant Pot has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection as the company that was already struggling is stung by inflation with Americans pulling back on spending

title: Minibus slams into parked pickup truck killing 15 in Southern Egypt
description: Egyptian authorities say a speeding minibus slammed into a parked pickup truck in Southern Egypt killing at least 15 people

title: Olympic sprinter Tori Bowie died from complications of childbirth, autopsy concludes
description: The autopsy report of Olympic sprinter Tori Bowie concluded she died from complications of childbirth

title: Trump indictment live updates: Former president heads to federal court in Miami
description: Former President Donald Trump is set to appear in federal court in Miami on Tuesday after he was indicted in an investigation into his handling of classified documents.

title: Playground slides doused with pool acid, injuring 2 children
description: Authorities say two children suffered what were described as “burn-like injuries” after playing on slides that had been doused with acid at a Massachusetts park

title: Using high-tech laser, UN-backed team scans Ukraine historical sites to preserve them
description: Two United Nations-backed engineers are using a high-tech laser to create incredibly high-resolution, three-dimensional renderings of historic sites in Ukraine

title: Stellantis recalling over 354,000 Jeeps; rear coil springs can detach while moving
description: Stellantis is recalling more than 354,000 Jeeps worldwide because the rear coil springs can fall off while they’re being driven

title: Millennial Money: How to use ChatGPT to plan your next trip
description: Artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT offer a novel way to research travel plans

title: Beijing criticizes new US sanctions on companies
description: China has criticized new sanctions imposed by the United States on companies believed to be involved in training Chinese military pilots and weapons development

title: Inflation dropped significantly in May, returning closer to normal levels
description: Inflation has fallen from a peak last summer but it remains elevated.

title: Treat Williams dies at 71: Hollywood pays tribute to veteran actor
description: Treat Williams, the veteran Hollywood actor who first rose to fame 1979's "Hair," has died following a motorcycle accident.

title: Custody battle emerges over kids who survived plane crash, 40 days in Amazon jungle
description: Relatives of four children who survived a plane crash followed by 40 days alone in Colombia's Amazon rainforest are reportedly fighting for custody of the siblings.

title: WATCH:  Man-made flying saucer takes to the skies
description: A man-made flying saucer has taken a test run in southern China.

title: No, Trump's classified documents case is not like Joe Biden or Hillary Clinton cases
description: Almost immediately after the Justice Department on Friday unsealed its indictment against Donald Trump, the former president's allies began crying foul.

title: Tory Lanez to be sentenced following conviction in Megan Thee Stallion shooting case
description: Tory Lanez is set to appear in a courtroom on Tuesday morning, where he will be sentenced following his conviction for shooting and injuring Megan Thee Stallion.

title: Man arrested after 3 found dead and van attempts to run over pedestrians: Police
description: A man has been arrested on suspicion of murder after three people were killed in the English city of Nottingham and a van attempted to run over others Tuesday morning.

title: Trump court appearance live updates: Former president heads to federal court in Miami
description: Former President Donald Trump is set to appear in federal court in Miami on Tuesday after he was indicted in an investigation into his handling of classified documents.

title: 9 injured in Denver shooting, police say
description: Nine people were injured, including three critically, in a shooting in Denver, police said.

title: 'Hair,' 'Everwood' actor Treat Williams killed in Vermont motorcycle crash
description: Actor Treat Williams, whose nearly 50-year career included starring roles in the TV series “Everwood” and the movie “Hair,” has died after a motorcycle crash in Vermont

title: 22 US troops injured in Syria in helicopter 'mishap,' military says
description: Twenty-two U.S. service members were injured on Sunday in northeastern Syria in a "mishap," military officials said Monday.

title: Denver Nuggets win first NBA title, beating the Miami Heat in the Finals
description: The Denver Nuggets have won their first NBA title by beating the Miami Heat in five games in the Finals

title: Law enforcement preps for Trump's arraignment, alert to possible 'turn for the worse'
description: Security ahead of Trump's arraignment in Miami has been organized between local and federal law enforcement

title: Pat Sajak says upcoming season of 'Wheel of Fortune' will be his last
description: Pat Sajak says the upcoming season of "Wheel of Fortune" will be his last.

title: Trump federal indictment: How serious are obstruction charges?
description: Legal experts say of all the charges filed against the former president and his aide, obstruction is one of the most serious.

title: WATCH:  Red-hued rainbow appears as sun sets over Yosemite National Park
description: A stunning red-hued rainbow appeared in the sky as the sun set over Yosemite National Park, a timelapse video shows.
